api_list.api_description: Retrieve parsed information about a user agent string using the GET method.

required_parameters.name: ua
required_parameters.description: The user agent string URL encoded.
required_parameters.default: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36

query: Can you estimate the ages of Emily, Michael, and Emma in the UK? Also, can you provide the detailed browser and device information for the user agent 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36'?
